item.title: Lethal Weapon 5: Confirmation, Cast & Everything We Know
item.description: After much speculation of whether or not it would ever happen, Lethal Weapon 5 appears to be a go. Here's what we know about this sequel.

item.title: Kinda Pregnant Ending Explained: How Lainy's Secret Is Exposed
item.description: Amy Schumer's Netflix rom-com movie ends when her character, Lainy, is forced to reveal that she had never been pregnant - so what happened next?

item.title: 10 Horror Movies With Monsters That Are Actually Nightmare Fuel
item.description: Some of the best horror movies feature terrifying monsters that could give viewers nightamres for days to come.
